  • Method Details

    • findAllEnabled

      @Query("SELECT c FROM Category c WHERE c.enable = true AND c.parent.enable = true ORDER BY c.name ASC") List<Category> findAllEnabled()

    • getChildren

      @Query("SELECT c FROM Category c WHERE c.enable = true AND c.parent.enable = true AND c.parent = ?1 ") Set<Category> getChildren(Category category)

    • getParent

      @Query("SELECT c.parent FROM Category c WHERE c.enable = true AND c.parent.enable = true AND c = ?1 ") Category getParent(Category category)

    • notParentCategory

      @Query("SELECT c FROM Category c WHERE c.enable = true AND c.parent = null ") List<Category> notParentCategory()
